BudgetSimulator.type_label: What do you need to solve?

disclaimer.title: Important Budget Note
disclaimer.text: This figure is a 'starting from' reference price. To give you an exact quote without commitment, we need to perform a free technical appraisal at your property. We want to give you the best real price.

large_scale.title: Large Scale Project
large_scale.text: For properties of this size, a chart doesn't do justice to the precision you deserve. We prefer to study your case personally to offer an optimized and professional proposal.

painting_note.title: About the Painting Service
painting_note.text: This price of 5€/m² applies to smooth walls and light colors. If the surface has defects, needs prior treatment, or dark colors, we will provide a free personalized valuation.

new_build.title: New Build
new_build.description: We design and build the villa of your dreams from scratch. Integral management from the foundation to the keys delivery.

renovation.title: Full Renovation
renovation.description: Complete transformation of homes. We elevate the standard of your property with luxury finishes and optimized distribution.

extension.title: Extension
extension.description: Need more space? We add square meters to your home integrating the new structure perfectly with the existing one.

pool.title: Designer Pools
pool.description: Infinity, saltwater, or heated pools. The perfect oasis for your garden with the latest technology.

rehabilitation.title: Rehabilitation
rehabilitation.description: Experts in recovering the beauty of old estates and historic structures, combining tradition with modern comfort.

humidity.title: Humidity Repair
humidity.description: We eliminate the problem at the root. Expert diagnosis and definitive treatments for rising damp, leaks, and condensation. Restore your home's health.

waterproofing.title: Waterproofing & Protection
waterproofing.description: A small moisture problem today can become an expensive repair tomorrow. We protect your investment against leaks in roofs, terraces, and facades with lasting solutions.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Repairs
maintenance.description: Complete service for your home: general repairs, water leak fixes, pool and garden maintenance. Your property always in perfect condition.

painting.title: Professional Painting
painting.description: We renew your spaces with perfect finishes. Specialists in interiors and facades with high-quality materials.

plastering.title: Plastering & Smoothing
plastering.description: Professionals in plaster applications and wall smoothing. Impeccable smooth finishes ready for painting.

flooring.title: Flooring & Tiling
flooring.description: Experts in flooring and cladding installation. Perfectly leveled floors with high-quality finishes.

kitchen.title: Kitchen Renovations
kitchen.description: Transform your kitchen into a functional and modern space. Custom design and top-quality materials.

bathroom.title: Bathroom Renovations
bathroom.description: Create your own personal oasis. Bathroom renovations with luxury finishes and maximum space optimization.

interior.title: Interior Renovations
interior.description: Complete interior renovation: floors, partitioning, lighting and finishes. Your home as good as new.

terrace.title: Terraces and Outdoor
terrace.description: Take advantage of the Costa del Sol weather. Renovations of terraces, pergolas and outdoor relaxation areas.

About.title: The Perfect Mix: Nerja + Holland
About.subtitle: Local Tradition and Spanish-Dutch Quality.
About.story: J&D Elite Builders was born from the union of two cultures. We are two young entrepreneurs, one native to Nerja and the other from Holland, who decided to join forces. We combine deep knowledge of the Costa del Sol terrain and local regulations with the methodology and precision that defines us. We are methodical and passionate about offering professional work, meticulously taking care of every technical and aesthetic detail.
About.satisfaction: Our greatest reward is knowing that there is nothing like leaving the client fully satisfied with their new home.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio of Excellence
Portfolio.subtitle: A selection of our most outstanding projects, where Dutch precision meets local passion.

ServicePage.why_trust_text: Founded by a local professional from Nerja and an expert from Holland, our company combines Mediterranean passion with Northern European discipline and precision. We don't just build houses, we create homes with international standards.

Footer.description: Leading construction company in Nerja and Costa del Sol. Specialists in full renovations, new builds, and maintenance with Spanish-Dutch quality.
